response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $800,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $720,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent opportunity to secure a remarkable asset at a competitive rate. I trust that you will find this proposal favorable and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 720000}
